supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-20 (in mm), (1) 23 x 32, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 30 x 48, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (3) 42 x 41, (A) 4 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (4) 45 x 25, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (5) 22 x 30, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (6) 38 x 30, (A) 2 lines, right bottom margins, (B) 2 lines, left top margins, (7) 28 x 27, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 22 x 18, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (9) 30 x 10, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (10) 34 x 32, (A) 1 line, top margin, (B) blank, (11) 23 x 19, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 36 x 39, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) 4 lines, left margin, (13) 37 x 33, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) 2 lines, bottom margin, (14) 64 x 28, (A) 6 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (15) 66 x 11, (A) 11 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (16) 49 x 18, (A) 9 lines, right margin (?), (B) blank, (17) 69 x 32, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (18) 45 x 9, (A) 1 line, bottom margin, (B) blank, (19) 45 x 9, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (20) 55 x 14, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank
